/** @format */ import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { register } from '../actions/userActions'; import MessageBox from '../components/MessageBox'; import LoadingBox from '../components/LoadingBox'; import { USER_SAVE_REGISTER_RESET } from '../constants/userConstants'; import RegisterSteps from '../components/RegisterSteps'; function RegisterUserDetails(props) { const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(''); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(''); const [state, setState] = useState(''); const [city, setCity] = useState(''); const [cluster, setCluster] = useState(''); const userRegister = useSelector((state) => state.userRegister); const { loading, userInfo, error } = userRegister; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(register({ firstName, lastName, state, city, cluster })); props.history.push('/'); dispatch({ type: USER_SAVE_REGISTER_RESET }); }; return (
{loading ? ( ) : (
{error && {error}} {userInfo && ( Registration is successful. Fill in Your Location )}

Create Account

Get started with your free account

setFirstName(e.target.value)} />
Looks good!
setLastName(e.target.value)} required />
Looks good!
setState(e.target.value)} />

setCity(e.target.value)} />
Please provide a valid city.
setCluster(e.target.value)} required={true} />

)}
); } export default RegisterUserDetails;
